author: Maybeinerror
title: Luxurious
text: My husband stays here on business and wanted our family to stay here for our vacation. The staff was truly exceptional--every member was friendly and welcoming. It is luxurious and so elegant--I loved the 1930s cafe society decor. We found the location convenient to the Tube (Bond Street station) and dinner options. Our children will never have it so good again--I hope they understand that! I, on the other hand, look forward to returning again on a future business trip!
